00121 /*****************************
00122     Error codes
00123 *****************************/
00124 //   1 - 10     System and File errors
00125 //  11 - 20     Program Limitations
00126 //  21 - 40     State Errors
00127 //  41 - 60     Parameter and Protocol Errors
00128 //  61 - 80     Execution Errors
00129 
00130 #define DIE_NOERROR         0
00131 
00132 #define DIE_NOMEM           1       /* Out of memory */
00133 #define DIE_SYSTEM          2       /* Miscellaneous system error */
00134 #define DIE_NOFILE          3       /* File nonexistant */
00135 #define DIE_BADFILE         4       /* Bad file format */
00136 #define DIE_VERSION         5       /* File version mismatch */
00137 #define DIE_DISKFULL        6       /* Target disk is full */
00138 
00139 #define DIE_INCAPABLE       11      /* Optional DI feature */
00140 #define DIE_OPTIONAL        11      /* Optional DI feature */
00141 #define DIE_UNIMPLEMENT     12      /* Unimplemented feature */
00142 #define DIE_LIMIT           13      /* Arbitrary program limit */
00143 #define DIE_BUG             14      /* Probably a bug in renderer */
00144 
00145 #define DIE_NOTSTARTED      23      /* DiBegin not called */
00146 #define DIE_NESTING         24      /* Bad begin-end nesting */
00147 #define DIE_NOTOPTIONS      25      /* Invalid state for options */
00148 #define DIE_NOTATTDIBS      26      /* Invalid state for attributes */
00149 #define DIE_NOTPDIMS        27      /* Invalid state for primitives */
00150 #define DIE_ILLSTATE        28      /* Other invalid state */
00151 #define DIE_BADMOTION       29      /* Badly formed motion block */
00152 #define DIE_BADSOLID        30      /* Badly formed solid block */
00153 
00154 #define DIE_BADTOKEN        41      /* Invalid token for request */
00155 #define DIE_RANGE           42      /* Parameter out of range */
00156 #define DIE_CONSISTENCY     43      /* Parameters inconsistent */
00157 #define DIE_BADHANDLE       44      /* Bad object/light handle */
00158 #define DIE_NOSHADER        45      /* Can't load requested shader */
00159 #define DIE_MISSINGDATA     46      /* Required parameters not provided */
00160 #define DIE_SYNTAX          47      /* Declare type syntax error */
00161 #define DIE_TOKENREDECLARED 48      /* Redeclaration of token */
00162 
00163 #define DIE_MATH            61      /* Zerodivide, noninvert matrix, etc. */
00164 
00165 #define DIE_BADATTRIB       140     /* Unsupported attribute */
00166 #define DIE_BADOPTION       141     /* Unsupported option */
00167 #define DIE_SPACEREDECLARED 142     /* Redeclaration of space */
00168 #define DIE_NODISPLAY       143     /* Can't load requested display server */
00169 #define DIE_ERRRERTOOBID    144     /* Image resolution too big */
00170 #define DIE_ERRBADSHADERPARAM 145   /* Parameter is not in shader param list */
00171 #define DIE_ERRSHADERPARAMMISMATCH 146      /* Value for parameter does not match declaration */
00172 #define DIE_ERRBADARRAYACCESSINSHADER 147   /* Invalid array index done in a shader */
00173 
00174 #define DIE_SHADER_PRINTF   199     /* output of a shader's printf() */
00175 
00176 /* Error severity levels */
00177 #define DIE_INFO            0       /* Rendering stats & other info */
00178 #define DIE_WARNING         1       /* Something seems wrong, maybe okay */
00179 #define DIE_ERROR           2       /* Problem. Results may be wrong */
00180 #define DIE_SEVERE          3       /* So bad you should probably abort */
00181 
00182 
00183 /*****************************
00184     Shader Language Interogation types
00185 *****************************/
00186 typedef enum
00187 {
00188     DSLO_TYPE_UNKNOWN,
00189     DSLO_TYPE_POINT,
00190     DSLO_TYPE_COLOR,
00191     DSLO_TYPE_SCALAR,
00192     DSLO_TYPE_STRING,
00193     DSLO_TYPE_SURFACE,
00194     DSLO_TYPE_LIGHT,
00195     DSLO_TYPE_DISPLACEMENT,
00196     DSLO_TYPE_VOLUME,
00197     DSLO_TYPE_TRANSFORMATION,
00198     DSLO_TYPE_IMAGER,
00199     /* New types (RiSpec 3.1) */
00200     DSLO_TYPE_VECTOR,
00201     DSLO_TYPE_NORMAL,
00202     DSLO_TYPE_MATRIX,
00203     DSLO_TYPE_SHADER
00204 
00205 } DSLO_TYPE;
00206 
00207 /* Storage class of the symbol */
00208 typedef enum
00209 {
00210     DSLO_STOR_UNKNOWN,
00211     DSLO_STOR_CONSTANT,
00212     DSLO_STOR_VARIABLE,
00213     DSLO_STOR_TEMPORARY,
00214     DSLO_STOR_PARAMETER,
00215     DSLO_STOR_OUTPUTPARAMETER,
00216     DSLO_STOR_GSTATE
00217 } DSLO_STORAGE;
00218 
00219 /* Variance of the symbol. Of course, in a shader, only varying & consant
00220     are useful */
00221 typedef enum
00222 {
00223     DSLO_DETAIL_UNKNOWN,
00224     DSLO_DETAIL_VARYING,
00225     DSLO_DETAIL_UNIFORM
00226 } DSLO_DETAIL;
00227 
00228 typedef struct {
00229     float xval;
00230     float yval;
00231     float zval;
00232 } DSLO_POINT;
00233 
00234 typedef float DSLO_SCALAR;
00235 
00236 typedef float* DSLO_MATRIX;
00237 
00238 typedef struct dslovissymdef
00239 {
00240     /* name of symbol */
00241     const char *svd_name;
00242 
00243     DSLO_TYPE svd_type;
00244     DSLO_STORAGE svd_storage;
00245     DSLO_DETAIL svd_detail;
00246 
00247     /* name of space in which to interpret symbol's value */
00248     const char *svd_spacename;
00249 
00250     union
00251     {
00252         /* pointers to default value */
00253         const DSLO_POINT *pointval;
00254         const DSLO_SCALAR *scalarval;
00255         const char *stringval;
00256         const float *matrixval;
00257     } svd_default;
00258 
00259     /* set to 0 if the value is not valid */
00260     unsigned svd_valisvalid:1;
00261 
00262     /* array length if the variable is an array */
00263     int svd_arraylen;
00264 
00265 } DSLO_VISSYMDEF;
00266 
00267 /*
00268     This is returned by Slo_GetMethod
00269 */
00270 typedef struct dslomethod
00271 {
00272     const char *name;
00273 
00274     unsigned num_parameters;
00275     unsigned num_optionals; 
00276 
00277     DSLO_VISSYMDEF *parameters;
00278     DSLO_VISSYMDEF *optionals;
00279 
00280     DSLO_VISSYMDEF *returnvalue;
00281 } DSLO_METHOD;

00303 class DZ_EXPORT DzShaderParameter : public QObject {
00304     Q_OBJECT
00305     Q_ENUMS( DzShaderParamType )
00306     Q_PROPERTY( int type READ getTypeAsInt )
00307 public:
00308     enum DzShaderParamType { UnknownType, PointType, NormalType, VectorType,
00309         ColorType, ScalarType, StringType, MatrixType };
00310 
00311     DzShaderParameter( const char *paramName, const DtVector &v, DzShaderParamType type );
00312     DzShaderParameter( const char *paramName, DtFloat v );
00313     DzShaderParameter( const char *paramName, const DtString str );
00314     DzShaderParameter( const char *paramName, const DtMatrix m );
00315     ~DzShaderParameter();
00316 
00317     DzShaderParamType   getType() const;
00318     int                 getTypeAsInt() const { return (int) getType(); }
00319 
00320 private:
00321     struct  Data;
00322     Data    *m_data;
00323 };
00324 
00325 
00326 class DZ_EXPORT DzShaderDescription : public QObject {
00327     Q_OBJECT
00328     Q_ENUMS( DzShaderType )
00329     Q_PROPERTY( int type READ getTypeAsInt )
00330 public:
00331     enum DzShaderType { SurfaceShader, LightShader, DisplacementShader,
00332         VolumeShader, ImageShader };
00333 
00334     DzShaderDescription( DzShaderType type );
00335     ~DzShaderDescription();
00336 
00337     void            addParameter( DzShaderParameter *param );
00338     DzShaderType    getType() const;
00339     int             getTypeAsInt() const { return (int) getType(); }
00340 
00341 public slots:
00342 
00343     int                         getNumParameters() const;
00344     const DzShaderParameter*    getParameter( int i ) const;
00345 
00346 private:
00347 
00348     struct  Data;
00349     Data    *m_data;
00350 };
